TextView.android:text: 1. How to add subjects ?
There is a ‘+’ floating button present at the bottom right of the subject page under navigation section. When you press it, a bottom dialog will appear where you can add your subjects.
2. What is the use of Calendar?
Calendar will keep a track on classes attended for a specific date. So if you want to see the subjects that you had attended on a particular date, simply click on the desired date.
3. How to use reminder?

Click on the ‘alarm icon’ present at the bottom of the page. A bottom dialog will appear where you can select your desired time and label. Click on the add button to set the reminder. In case if you want to cancel your alarm, just click on the ‘cancel alarm” button on the same page.
4. How to delete and edit subject?
Long press the subject which you want to delete or edit, a dialog box appear where you can edit the subject name or delete it.
5.Is an internet connection required for using the app?
Yes , AttendO will use your phone’s cellular connection or Wi-Fi network for using authentication and account feature .
6.Found a bug? Report us !

If you encounter any type of problem related to its functioning, then you can report us. To report a bug , click the report bug under account navigation section. Describe the problem that you have faced and click on the send button.
7. How to edit attendance criteria ?
By default attendance criteria is set to 75%. If you wish to change it,go the edit attendance criteria page, enter your own criteria and click on the change button.
8. How to edit profile account?
In the account option there is a ‘Edit Account’ button present at the bottom of that page. Click on it to make changes in your profile.
9. How to delete account?

Deleting your account is an irreversible process, which can’t revert even if you perform it by accident. To delete your account: Click on the ‘Edit Account’ button under account option. Then, click on ‘delete account’ icon, to permanently delete your account.
10. Found our app useful? Want to appreciate us?
Go the ‘Rate App’ section, give your feedback regarding the app and click on the submit button. You can also rate our app on playstore!
11. Confused about where did the excel file go after it was exported?

To locate the excel file, just open your default file manager app on your phone and go to your internal storage of your device and there you can find a new folder called AttendO. Navigate inside that folder and you can see a file named student.xls.
12. Getting started with Routine feature in attendo

1. Routine is a new feature in AttendO which will help the users to manage their daily routine which is cloud based and real time. 

 2. To get started with it, click on the routine tab in the bottom navigation pane and you will be asked either to create a classroom or join an existing classroom. If you are in a college or university ask your Class representative or class monitor to create a classroom and after the classroom has been created the students of that particular classroom can join using the class code which will be generated automatically after successfully classroom has been generated. 

 3. This part is for CR or Class Monitor. If you are the class monitor then click on the routine tab in bottom navigation tab and click on create classroom option from the dialog that will appear from bottom. After that it will ask to fill some data regarding your name, roll name or scholar Id, and name of the classroom that you want to make. After few seconds classroom will be created and you will be joined automatically as the class monitor of the your class. 
 After that you class monitor can share the class code from his account section in settings tab. 
 Students of the particular class should join filling the necessary details as class code , name and scholar id or roll number.
13. Different features of routine

Overview: There are 7 days on top of the screen in routine tab just like your general routine in paper. All the classes that are present will be shown below the days cards. One can view any day's routine by clicking on the days cards. Note that data or classes will only be shown if Class monitor adds any subject else it wont show anything. The floating action button upon clicking will reveal more floating action buttons. One of them is batch mates and another is notice. Notice will be there whenever class monitor post any notice and in the batch mates section you can see how many students have joined the the class till now. By this class monitor can verify if all the students have joined or not.

1. Class monitor can add subjects by clicking on the plus button which is revealed on clicking the arrow button Once the class is added for a particular day, a notification will be sent to every student joined in class about the subject addition. On long click class monitor can edit the timings days and names of existing classes or delete them. Students cannot add or edit or delete any subject. \n\n 2. Class monitor can go to notice section and add , edit and delete any notice. Upon addition or edit students will be notified about the change.
14. What if you want to change your name in routine account ?
Just leave the class and rejoin again. That should do the work
